arts.ttl: Carlos Carvalhal says he’s rejected Al Shabab – Manager going to Wolves creates vacancy
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers are in the process of bringing Al Shabab FC manager Vítor Pereira to Molineux. Earlier today, we covered claims from Portugal which stated Wolves are trying to lower the cost from €1m to €700-800k for Pereira. arts.ttl: Man Utd target Matheus Cunha's feelings clear as Wolves U-turn on Gary O'Neil
arts.sum: As Gary O’Neil’s torrid Wolves tenure ends, one of the club’s brighter lights, Matheus Cunha, has made his opinion on the sacking and a potential Man Utd switch clear

arts.ttl: Preview: Braga vs. Famalicao - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Monday's Primeira Liga clash between Braga and Famalicao, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wolves striker Matheus Cunha could face FA ban after ugly scenes following Ipswich loss
arts.sum: Ipswich Town beat Wolves in dramatic fashion in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon and after tempers flared following the final whistle, an investigation could be launched
